comment: While he's taught for 10+ years, he can't relay the info to students.  When asked questions he confused us more by giving more info than needed.  Would probably be great for a higher level class, but for an intro class gives too much info.  He is willing to help and he does want you to do well, but I basically had to teach myself.

Definitely not the easiest professor out there, but he's very easy to work with and willing to help.  His tests DO go up in difficulty as the semester goes on, so he's not kidding when he says to not fall into a false sense of security.  Even though the homework isn't grade it, DO IT and ask LOTS of questions and he'll help you out.

Prof. Cares' class is not easy by any means.  If you stay for recitation, he will help with the mandatory homework (easy grade) and any calcs/formulas that you are having difficulty with.  I found that if you follow his lecture with your lecture notes (sent prior to class), let him talk during class.  Stay during the recitation to ask questions.
Over qualified for chem 1101. lots of homework.
DO NOT TAKE HIM FOR CHEM 1211K (Principles of Chemistry I). He is WAY over qualified for teaching Chem 1. Please DO NOT take him.
Terrible teacher just talks and expects everyone to already know the material. He goes off topic about non sense and his tests are insanely hard. AVOID THIS CLASS!

Easy lecture professor, and helpful lab instructor. Emails notes for each chapter that serve as a "lecture guide". Bring a laptop or tablet to read them as they are usually about 20 printed pages. Talks monotonically, but no accent unlike Kang or Zhou. Follow the lectures and you'll do well on tests. Gives 2 bonus pts for 80% recitation attendance

This is the worst teacher I have ever had!! He can not teach to save his life. His test are incredibly hard, which the class avg was never passing. His test contain material never covered in the course. 90% of the class failed the course. So I advise you to avoid him at all cost.

He makes everything seem hard when it's pretty easy. Very monotone. Puts everyone to sleep. Try and pay attention and take good notes. Tests are fair but kinda hard. Do the optional hw and you'll be fine. Read the book if you need help. Sends notes but going to class helps. Sometimes contradicts himself so make sure you ask him more than once.

Very willing to help anyone and everyone. 4 tests, one dropped, and mandatory final. Recitation + Lab = 35%. No quizzes or mandatory homework (understand the optional homework and you'll be fine). Sends lecture transcript in advance.
took him for lecture, he makes the easiest concepts seem hard.  Very boring, tests are hard, its a good thing he will drop the lowest test grade.  Do not take him!
